Thanks to the Access to Baby Formula Act that I helped pass, @USDANutrition is now expanding waivers for infant formula!

This means more infant formula will be available in the Central Coast, so parents can raise their children with one less worry in mind. https://t.co/TYPTQYJIsu

We owe it to our veterans to make sure they are taken care of when they come home.

During every D-Day anniversary, we remember the American & other Allied service members who fought for freedom against tyranny that day. https://t.co/Li53fdX9vD

Abandoned oil wells can leak hazardous greenhouse gases for years after they're closed.

Thanks to the Bipartisan Infrastructure Law that I helped pass, orphaned wells on the Channel Islands will soon be capped to reduce these harmful carbon leaks!
